topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558844406368721b1b000567#post_558844406368721b1b000567
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558846656368721b710006ea#post_558846656368721b710006ea
Here is the worst part. That is a domesticated silver fox. It is TRULY domesticated. It has virtually no aggressive or violent instincts. It would sooner lick your face that bite your hand. Not to mention that those adorable little fuckers are super expensive. It's one of the few good things to come out of the USSR.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body: Man this day was going so well too. I woke up early. Got some stuff done. Had a really good sandwich. And was just happy and watching Power Rangers. And now there's this boiling festering hatred inside me for the entire fucking world. Thanks a lot for that.
